description: Heavy grease buildup on stovetop and counters transformed to a sparkling kitchen. Grout between tiles scrubbed white, appliance exteriors polished, and cabinet fronts degreased.
Shower tile grout restored from dark grey to its original white. Hard water stains removed from glass door, fixtures descaled, and floor tiles deep-scrubbed.
High-traffic carpet with years of ground-in dirt and pet stains. Hot water extraction brought back the original color and removed all visible staining.
Cluttered, dusty open-plan office with coffee stains on desks and debris under workstations. Transformed into a clean, organized workspace ready for Monday morning.
Newly finished basement covered in drywall dust, paint splatters, and construction debris. Our three-phase cleanup left the space move-in ready and dust-free.
Empty studio apartment with years of wear â€” scuffed floors, grimy appliances, and stained counters. Deep cleaned to pass landlord inspection and secure the full deposit return.
Two years of Pacific Northwest weather buildup on exterior windows. Professional squeegee cleaning revealed views that had been hiding behind a film of grime and water spots.
Family sectional sofa with pet hair, food stains, and body oil buildup. Low-moisture extraction restored the fabric color and eliminated embedded odors.
